description:
Luffy makes short work of a few hundred marines, the Franky Family takes down a giant, and the assassins of CP9 report back to Spandam!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Battle Against Giants! Open the Second Gate!
Combat contre les géants ! Ouvrez la deuxième porte !
Kyojinzoku to no Koubou! Daini no Tobira o Akero!
Битва с гигантами! Открыть Вторые врата!
巨人族との攻防! 第二の扉を開けろ!
